pageProduct.name: Palmers Cocoa Butter Formula Lotion 400ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Cocoa Butter Formula Body Lotion is a rich, luxurious, daily body lotion which softens and smoothes rough, dry skin, and provides deep hydration all over. Now with 48 hour moisture.

Palmer's® Cocoa Butter Formula Body Lotion is a velvety soft formula which absorbs quickly, creating a protective barrier that locks in moisture, leaving it smooth and supple. Made with pure Cocoa Butter and Vitamin E, it smoothes marks and tones skin. Suitable for eczema prone skin. Cocoa Butter is naturally harvested from cocoa beans, and is a rich, nutrient-packed super ingredient loaded with antioxidant CMPs (Cocoa Mass Polyphenols) for superior skin care and moisture barrier protection.

Suitable For: All skin types.

Product Claims: Softens and smoothes

Recommended By: Dermatologist

Size: 400mL

Dermatologist Recommended?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• Daily body lotion to soften and relieve skin.
• Now with 48 hour moisture.
• * 3 out of 4 dermatologists recommend Palmer's when recommending cocoa butter.
• Suitable for eczema prone skin
• Vegan
• Paraben and Phthalate Free.
• No animal ingredients or testing

Warnings

For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with eyes.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Theobroma Cacao Extract, Glyceryl Stearate, Petrolatum, Propylene Glycol, Glycerin, Cocos Nucifera Oil, Paraffinum Liquidum, Theobroma Cacao Seed Butter, Elaeis Guineensis Oil, Cetyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Hydroxyethylcellulose, PEG-8 Stearate, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Butylene Glycol, Stearalkonium Chloride, Cellulose, Sodium Acetate, Parfum, Dimethyl Stearamine, Phenoxyethanol, Sorbic Acid, Benzoic Acid, Stearyl Alcohol, Myristyl Alcohol, CI 19140, CI 15510, Benzyl Alcohol.

Contains: Cocoa Butter, Vitamin E

Directions

Use daily on clean, dry skin.
